import React, { useState } from 'react' import Icons from '../svg/Icon' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import s from './header.module.scss' import { langs } from '../../App' import card from '../../assets/images/cart-2.svg' function Header (props) { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const [openCart, setOpenCart] = useState(false) const { t, i18n } = useTranslation() const changeLanguage = () => { if (props.lang + 1 < langs.length) { props.setCurrentLanguage(props.lang + 1) i18n.changeLanguage(langs[props.lang + 1]) } else { i18n.changeLanguage(langs[0]) props.setCurrentLanguage(0) } } return (
changeLanguage()}>

changeLanguage()}> {langs[props.lang]}

{isOpen ? (
setIsOpen(!isOpen)} >
HOME SELL HOST ABOUT US SUPPORT
) : (
setIsOpen(!isOpen)}>
)}
setOpenCart(!openCart)} className={s.menu__icon}> {props.cartProducts.length}
)}
) } export default Header
